features: 【🔥 Native 1080p FHD, 4K UHD support】Artlii Energon 2 uses an original physical resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels, supports 4K, and has 5 layers of high refractive glass lens. You can also connect to a streaming TV stick (not included) to watch your favorite streaming services like Netflix and Disney Plus.

【🔥 340 ANSI lumens & 17 Million Color Range】Improved with an Mstar performance chip and TFT LCD technology, Artlii Energon 2 provides 340 ANSI lumens brightness, which is much brighter and more colorful than other 1080p WiFi Bluetooth projectors. Color gamut is up to 80% of NTSC which provides up to a 17 million color range, and can display 100% RGB color signals

【🔥 Fast & Stable 2.4G/5G WiFi & Bluetooth Connection】 With the latest WiFi connection, Artlii Energon 2 enables you to mirror your smartphone screen using either 2.4G or 5G WiFi. Ultra-fast 5G WiFi offers you a much smoother and more lag free online video streaming experience. With a Bluetooth connection, you can connect to various bluetooth speakers and headphones, offering excellent sound quality and louder sound without connecting to a wired external speaker.

【🔥250'' large image size, Image zoom 60% to 100%】Artlii Energon 2 offers a display 44" - 250", projector distance is 5ft-27ft. Aspect ratio is 4:3/16:9/Auto. Manual ± 15 ° keystone correction. You can customize your projection screen size from 60% to 100% by remote control or manually.

【🔥Versatile Digital Connectivity】 Artlii home theater projector supports HDMI / USB / VGA / AV / SD card input / audio output 3.5mm / Bluetooth. It can be connected not only wireless but also wired. HDMI and USB port design makes it easier to connect streaming TV sticks, PCs, laptops, MacBooks, smartphones, Blu-ray disc players, and gaming consoles.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: You Deserve Better！Get Higher Quality Home Theater Projector with an Affordable Cost！ Artlii Energon2 Pro - 2023 Latest 5G WiFi Bluetooth Home Theater Projector Support 4k ! Native Resolution: 1920*1080Max Resolution: Support 4K UHDBrightness: 340 ANSI lumen, 30+% brightness than other 1080p wifi Bluetooth projectorColor Gamut: 80%Project Size/Distance: 44-250 inches/5~27 feetBest project Size/Distance: 70 inches/7.8 feetKeystone Correction: ±15° Manual VerticalBluetooth Connection: Bluetooth headphones, Bluetooth speaker, SoundbarWireless streaming: IOS, Android, Windows10, Laptop, TabletsWired streaming: HDMI / VGA / AV / SD / USB, connect to various devices like TV Stick, X-BOX, PS4, PC, Laptop, USB, SD cards, etc For the Energon 2 full hd projector instruction video, please click artlii store (below listing tittle) -Video Instruction!

Why Choose Artlii Energon2 Home Theater Projector？Here are Four Reasons For You！ Ideal Choice for Better Image Effects Resolution represents pixels. Taking 1920*1080 as an example, this means that there are 1920 pixels upstream in the horizontal direction and 1080 pixels in the vertical direction. These pixels together form the entire picture. If you zoom in on the picture many times, you can see these pixels. There is no doubt that the more pixels, the higher the picture resolution. The Energon 2 projector's chip consists of tens of thousands of reflective lenses, each lens is quickly switched every second to render 1080P full HD picture, it the best choice for indoor and outdoor entertainment. High Brightness Up to 340 ANSI Lumen The brightness of the projector has always been one of the main criteria for judging the image quality of a projector. In order to increase the brightness of the projector and increase the service life of the product, we chose the LED with the highest luminous efficiency as the light source for the projector. Artlii Energon 2 use a total of 242 LEDs combined together to form a powerful luminous source, providing powerful illumination of 340 ANSI lumens. Excellent Color Gamut Up to 80%NTSC When debugging our Energon 2, the three basic colors of red, green, and blue were strengthened separately, and the coordinate range of red, green, and blue in the color gamut space was expanded as much as possible, so that the three The color gamut space composed of each color reaches 80%. Our Energon 2 can display 17 million colors. With the adjustment of these three colors and Gamma correction, it can directly and significantly improve the sensory effect of the picture. High-quality Home Theater Chip - Mstar Artlii Energon 2 Native 1080P projector utilizes Mstar high-performance home theater chip with a maximum image processing capability of 1080P 60Hz, supports H264, H265 video decoding, and Mstar's proprietary Advanced color Engine, with outstanding picture performance. We hereby provide you 4 reasons to choose Artlii Energon2 !

Dolby Audio Supported home theater projector with Various Bluetooth Connection！ Real Bluetooth Projector！ Integrated stereo speakers provide a high-quality audio experience. With Bluetooth, you can wirelessly connect to Bluetooth devicesWith built-in speakers, the sound is powerful and dynamic, giving you a true home theater experience.Projector’s Bluetooth can connect with Bluetooth speakers\Earphones\Soundbar, but not with Phones\Computers. Dolby Audio Supported home projector！ fully supports Dolby Digital plus、Dolby Digital、Dolby AC3please note that Dolby Atmos is not supported for now To Pair the bluetooth device: When you are trying to connect to a Bluetooth device, please make sure the Bluetooth device is in Pair Mode before click the scan button. Start the Projector and click on Setting- Find the Bluetooth Key and turn on the bluetooth- then Press Scan to pair the devices.Bluetooth is a technology transmitting Audios not Videos. If want to cast the device’s screen, please use the function “iOS cast” or “Miracast”. Note：Please scan the QR code in the user manual to view video tutorials about Bluetooth connections.

Not Just Wireless：Try Wired Screen Mirroring Now！ Wireless Screen Mirroring-Various Connection choices For various iOS/Android devices normally.Supports iOS、MAC、iPad、Android Phone、Windows 10 computer. Wired Screen Mirroring-2022 Upgraded Feature Only for iOS、iPad，Not for Android devices.Support wired mirroring only with lightning charging cable. Note：Please Scan the QR code in the user manual to view video tutorials about Mirroring Function.

Unique Fast 5G/2.4G WiFi Connection：We Make Everything Simple！ Get Real 5G WiFi Projector Now！ Without any wireless dongle, adapter or cable, the Artlii Energon2 WiFi projector can display the ios, the content screen of the Android smartphone, on a large screen for projection. Especially when the home projector is hanging from the ceiling, the Artlii Energon 2 WiFi projector gives you wireless freedom, you can enjoy games, videos, TV series, photos, sports games, UEFA Champions League, etc. How to connect Android / iOS via WiFi? Go to Settings and let the projector connect to your wifi first (make sure your phone is connected to the same wifi)Enable iOS Cast/Miracast in Control Center.then select AirPlay / Screen Mirroring / Miracast on the screen of your smartphone.Connect the projector devices to your phone (airplay for iOS, Miracast for Android devices) Note：Please Scan the QR code in the user manual to view video tutorials about WiFi connections.

We Provide You Bigger Screen Experience for Home Theater！ Home Cinema Projection Screen Mega 250 " The Full HD 1080Pmovie projector has a built-in LCD screen. With its unique projection technology, it can achieve 44" -250" images No space constraints：100% → 60% zoom Artlii Energon2 projector supports remote control to reduce the image to 60% of the original length and widthno more space constraints, no need to change the projector distance, just move the projector to fit the screen sizeDue to the chip replacement, the zoom function of part projectors is 75%,the rest functions / parameters remain unchanged. How to use zoom to adjust image size? Streaming video via HDMI port : Play the video- Click menu button on the remote control- Click digital zoom under Image button.Streaming Video via USB port : Play the video- Click menu button on the remote control- Click digital zoom under setting button. Please Note：Zoom is not supported when using screen mirroring.

More info about Artlii Energon2 movie projector-Top questions How to play Netflix / Disney + / Amazon prime Video movies? Due to copyright issues Netflix / Disney / Amazon prohibits playing movies from the projectorYou can use a TV Stick or Roku Stick to connect the projector to watch the connect from Netflix, Hulu and similar servicesTV stick and Roku stick require additional purchase（not included） Why is there no sound when plugging in the TV stick? It supports Dolby Digital, but does not support Dolby Digital Plus. The sound of the TV stick generally defaults to Dolby Digital Plus.The following are the steps to set up Dolby Digital: Settings-Display and Sound-Audio-Surround Sound-Choose PCM or Dolby Digital. How can I use the projector to play 4k movies? When connecting your laptop or TV Stick to the projector via HDMI port or playing Youtube and other streaming media via mirrorcastArtlii Energon 2 native 1080p 4k projector can offer a 4k high-performance immersive movie experience.The movie you play is need to be 4k format. Note：Please scan the QR code in the user manual to view video tutorials about more functions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Went shopping for a 40 in. Smart TV and ended up with a 100+ in. projector, and couldnt be happier.
reviews.reviewText: True Native 1080p, it actually projects a 1080p quality image.Excellent purchase for the price against other potential options in both flatscreen tvs and projectors.First, Ill get the few minor cons out of the way.The light source is not "replaceable", as they are in other higher end units, but not a huge issue due to being LED and should inherently have a long enough life span, should.There is no option, other than warranty voiding disassembly, to clean the internal mirrors or lens and the rear filter does little to "filter".The filter plate is the same material as most AC units use, so anything less than hair will get through and onto the lens causing what appear to be smudge spots that can not be cleaned from the outside and will show up on bright or white heavy pictures.The outside lens can easily be superficially damaged when cleaning if not careful. Nothingless than a brand new, or never used on anything else, microfiber cloth and EXTREMELY GENTLE pressure is required to clean off the exposed lens without any scratching.A quality optical cleaning kit specifically made for projectors should be used, products for cleaning high-end cameras or hunting scopes could probably be used as well without issue.NO ABRASIVE SPRAYS OR MATERIALS SHOULD BE USED.But those "cons" really arent too much of an issue especially for what you get in return. Above all the picture quality is very good both with color brightness and contrast from blacks and whites, UI is very easy to setup and use, built in speakers are decent enough to enjoy without an external sound system or even headphones.The multitude of connection options and compatability with other devices is nice and the cooling fan isnt much louder than a standard PC fan. It isnt whisper quiet at all and TVs dont have fan sound issues so it may take some getting used to any sound at all but its not a jet turbine handling a overclocked PC, and when your watching something with sound it really does fall into that realm of unnoticable.This is a perfect "entry" level projector for those looking to get into the projector world and stay with for quite awhile.If you're a smoker of anything, use essential oil diffusers, have pets, live in a dusty area, or practice cutting drywall as a hobby just beware of potential excessive dust build up on the internal lens.Dust can and will affect the picture quality much more and quicker than a regular tv though.I could go on about this and other features but I'll just say this.The picture hovers around true native 1080 when projected onto a $20 fabric movie screen through a decent internet wifi connection through a firestick streaming youtube videos.It may not be a crystal clear OLED and it definitely isnt eyewatering 4k, but for sub $300 I have a true 1080p 100 in. screen with decent sound.I have yet to try it myself, but videogames seem like they would look great from watching said youtube. Sound lag, refresh rates, and other issues with MIGHT affect online play but for single player games it seems to be spectacular. Movies, horror game playthroughs, 4k walks of Japan, and nature/space galleries all look amazing both in picture quality and sheer image size.Anything comparable televison wise wouldve been ridiculous both in price, space, and justification.One of the few non-essential items I've bought and continually pat myself on the back for the decision.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Image Quality
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Pros:I have tried many projectors in this price range and this had the best image quality of any of them: Very sharp, very bright, with realistic colors and contrast. You can see in the photos that the screen is bright enough to see with the lights on in the room as well.The interface is very straightforward and easy to navigate. It can be linked via bluetooth to an iOS or Android device, but I used it with a google chromecast into the HDMI port. Unlike other projectors I have tried, this one doesn't have built-in apps. I actually appreciate that because I have always found those to be difficult to navigate. I much prefer the simpler interface.The screen is bright enough to be visible with the lights on in our home. The image quality is very robust. I have used other projectors which over-saturate the colors, and that is not the case with this one.The packaging was impressive as well. It comes in a nice carrying case.This is a good projector if you are planning to install it in one fixed location. I don't recommend it as a projector you move around, as it doesn't seem to have much flexibility.Cons:There is limited keystone correction, only +-15 degrees, so make sure you are planning to install it at roughly the same height as the projected image. I tried having it on a table and projecting up at an angle, and I found it difficult to get the keystone and focus dialed in. It also seemed like the keystone created some uneven focus across the image. Some further tweaking will be necessary to get the image focus consistent.Overall:If you are planning to install this projector in one place and leave it there, this is one of the best projectors for the price that I have used. If you plan to move the projector around, or need more keystone correction, try another projector. Bottom line: the image quality is great and the interface is easy to use, so I recommend this projector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great picture, but you should know...
reviews.reviewText: PROS: At this price point, the Artlii Energon 2 is one of the best projectors I have researched, reviewed, or used. The picture is bright, the resolution is sharp, and unlike some other projectors I tested with flimsy switches and focus controls, the Artlii Energon 2, is a mechanically well-built, sturdy projector. The software makes it easy to set-up for various inputs, connecting to a wi-fi network, mirror a cellphone or IPad, and connecting to a bluetooth speaker. Mirroring of mobile devices works well, displaying personal photos, videos, or business presentations.CONS: Unlike much more expensive projectors, the Artlii is not a "smart" projector with video streaming apps pre-loaded (Netflix, Hulu, Amazon Prime, for example). It is also not like a HD TV that is HDCP-enabled, (High-Bandwidth Digital Content Protection), so you CANNOT mirror, or even stream through a hard-wired HDMI cable, any copyright-protected video content from a mobile phone or IPad. The only way to view shows from your favorite provider is to purchase a Fire Stick, Roku, or Chromecast wi-fi connector at the same time you purchase the projector and plug it into one of the two HDMI ports . I am using the Fire Stick 4k HDR and can stream from my Netflix account. The picture and audio is excellent. This information would have saved me many hours of research, trial, and error and should be included on the Artlii website, as well as other projectors in this price range.
Simple à utiliser…belle qualité d’image pour le prix je recommande

Me encantó el proyector, tiene muy buena resolución, es súper fácil de utilizar y configurar. Yo lo estoy usando con un chromecast para reproducir mi contenido y todo excelente, he visto contenido en YouTube, Netflix, Prime, etc. Me sorprendió el sonido interno que tiene, no esperaba mucho en ese rubro, pero de verdad es muy bueno, hace que se te olvide el ruido del ventilador el cual calificaría como el ruido "normal" (con base en mi experiencia con otros proyectores). Definitivamente lo que más me gusta es el tema Bluetooth, pues si bien como dije, el sonido que tiene ya es bueno, al poder conectarlo por Bluetooth las opciones de audio incrementan pues lo puedes conectar a cualquier sistema de teatro en casa (por ejemplo) y la experiencia mejora aún más. Lo recomiendo y lo volvería a comprar.

We had other beamers before the ones from tiktok and such but it was never really that great then we found this one and boy oh boy is this one good it works like a charm and it is great in the autofocus and keystone area it does as it says the biggest negative we could find is that the noise from the fan inside is on the louder side but don't take this as a dealbreaker its more like if we have to say something negative because this is probably THE best for the price.

Das Gerät funktioniert super, genau wie ich es mir vorgestellt habe. Automatische Schärfe Einstellung, Bild und Ton Qualität, die Zoomfunktion, die USB- Schnittstellen zum abspielen meiner Videos von der Festplatte. Dieses Gerät kann ich nur empfehlen. Ach ja, dafür ist der Preis auch okay.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Fantastic kit, has neflix and amazon prime built in, cant get my phone to cast but has a hdmi port to plug in a fire stick. Honestly the video posted does not do it justice, auto keystone and auto focus is a life saver, can be abit on the loud side but when using the projector for sound cant really notice it. Great value compared to others at the same price. Highly recommend!
